name: Felix Loftus
bioHTML: Felix Loftu's practice encompasses interactive sound, film, and computational photography, using them to create immersive installations. Felix works with environmental storytelling through relational poetics, attempting to challenge and disrupt the memory-making patterns of new-media.

events.title: Spotlight Panel: Can plants and animals make art?
events.desc: This panel is a chance to learn more about our artist's making work which explores multispecies artmaking and whether plants and animals can be their own artists, performers and musicians.
